ygData.subject: Re: Good Role Playing Servers.
ygData.msgSnippet: I cannot put this strongly enough, the PvP Teams Servers are fantastic.  It allows me to indulge my RP desires fully with built in tension and politics.
ygData.messageBody:
I cannot put this strongly enough, the PvP Teams Servers are fantastic. It
allows me to indulge my RP desires fully with built in tension and politics.


>From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>

>Hi,
>
>In your opinion, what has been the server that has given you the best role
>playing experience? I am currently on the Rathe Server, and find it (now

>
>What are all of your opinions?
